Plot: A curious and lost Eleonore looks for something everywhere, even in the bags of strangers who find themselves sadly smiling only well after she's left their lives. They owe her their thanks.
Title: The Pleasure of Being Robbed
Writer: Eleonore Hendricks (screenplay), Joshua Safdie (story & screenplay), Andy Spade (story), Anthony Sperduti (story)
Actors: Bat 'Batman' Baxter, Alex Billig, Wayne Chin, Jerry Damons
